text: Mikhaylovka () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Polyakovsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 22 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located 14 km from Davlekanovo, 8 km from Polyakovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Mikhaylovka, Davlekanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
